1.title: Kristian Thalaite u
1.lyrics:
Kristian thalaite u lungrual takin,
Lalpa tana thawk fo turin;
Hmatiam hylen tumin kan ke pen rualin,
Lalram i din thar zel ang u.

Thiltha ti atan a siam a awmin,
Ama kutchhuak kan ni si a;
Chu thil tha tih chu kan awmna turin,
Lalpa'n a buatsaih lawk a ni,

Kan vanglaini te hi a rei lovang,
He khawvel a kan kan cham chhung hian;
Chuvangin vanglai hunte hmang thain,
Lalpa tan i thawk zel ang u.

Kan vanglaini te hi hlobet par angin,
A parmawina a la chuai ang;
Nakinah Lalpan min hruai hun chuan,
A lo la par vul leh ngei ang.

2.title: Ka nung reng ang kristaah
2.lyrics:
Nunna Krista ka neih chinah,
Tuarna phena malsawmna;
Ka thlarau chuan a chang ta,
Ka lawm zel thin, eng lai pawhin.


Khawvel hlimna ten min au mahse,
Hnuchhawn ram ka ngai tawh lo'ng;
Khawvel ni kin ni pawh lo thleng mahse,
Ka nung reng ang Kristaah chuan.


Hnehna nun ka neih chinah,
Ka thlarau, rilru, taksa;
Malsawm a ni tih ka hria,
Vankai nun pawh pek tawh ka ni.

Ka thlarau a thi lovang,
Thihna hlimkawr zawh hunin,
Ka taksa boral mahse,
Ka luah tawh ang, Van in mawi khi.


Bridge:

Krista Isuaah chuan,
Ama rual veka min kaithovin;
Van hmunah te ama hnenah min thuttir ta a,
Amen, Haleluiah!

3.title: Pathian Hmangaihna
3.lyrics:
Ka chhut nawn fo thin Pathian hmangaihna hi,
Zing, chhun, zan, englai pawn a hnai reng;
Ka chakloh ber lai pawn min ensan lo,
Min hmangaih, min thlahthlam ve ngai lo.

A chuai ve lo, a thar zel thin,
A chul thei lo Pathian hmangaihna thu hi;
Min hruaina chanchin ngaihnawm hi ziak dawn ila,
Ka hun leh theihna te hian a tlin lovang.

Hmangaihna sang ber Pathian hmangaihna chuan,
Lal Isua fa mal neihchhun min pe;
Midang tan ka thiltih tlem zia chhut hian,
Ka hmangaih nep zia ka hmuchiang thin.

Ka damchhung zawng hian ka theihna tlem tal in,
Lalpa chu fak mai tur ka lo ni;
Misual kei rawngbawltuah min thlang hi,
A hmangaih ropui zia ti chiangtu.

4.title: Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan
4.lyrics:
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan,
Lungngaih, mangan a awm tawh lo’ng;
Chatuana kan inah,
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan.
He lei a lawmna leh hlimna hla kan sak hi,
Van lawm kan tem lawkna mai a ni;
Hlimna chuai thei lo chu van ina kan chang ang,
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan.
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan,
Lungngaih, mangan a awm tawh lo’ng;
Chatuana kan inah,
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan.
Sual a ta chhanchhuah te’n, “Halleluiah Amen”
Tiin hnehna hla mawi an sa ang;
Thinlung lawm leh hlimin fakna hla an sa ang,
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan.
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan,
Lungngaih, mangan a awm tawh lo’ng;
Chatuana kan inah,
Zaia faktu an haw hun chuan.

5.title: Kan zinkawngah
5.lyrics:
Kan zinkawngah hian Lalpa min hruai la,
Tuifawnten min chim kan pil thuai dawn e;
I lam kan lo hawi khua kan tlai hma hian,
Lo hnai rawh, aw chhandamtu.

Chhandamtu min hruai rawh kan zinkawngah hian,
Thli leh ruah, tuifawnten min chim reng e;
Kan dinna lungpui nghing ve ngai lo chuan,
Van thlen thlengin min kai ang che.

Khawvelin min au ding leh vei lamah,
Hmuhsitna au thawmten min rawn thawng a;
Harsatna kara kan mittui far hi,
Lawmna hla an chang ngei ang.

Damchhung ni chhiar dan min zirtir ang che,
I van chanchin khi min hrilh nawn fo la;
Zinkawng thui tak hi nang tel lo chuanin,
Kan zuam lo, min hruai ang che.

6.title: Inpeih thuai rawh
6.lyrics:
Aw ka dam chhung nite hai loten a liam zel e,
Pan leh vanglai hunte pawh chuaiin a her liam a;
Sanna leh hausaknaten kum tam a daih nem le,
Saruak maia kir lehin an her liam thin.

Inpeih thuai rawh, Chhûm zingah a lo kal dawn;
Tap chungin i in leh lo kalsan a tul tawh ang,
Khawngaih hun a liam tawh ang.

Lalthutthleng var hmaa hnam ze tin an inkhawmin,
Nunna bua ziak ang a ka hming an lam hun chuan;
Lawm avanga mittui nen tlantu chibai bukin,
A ropui turzia chu aw ka sawi thei lo.

Lal Isua nei si lova thlafam i chan ni chuan,
‘Khawngaihin kawng min hawn rawh’ tap chungin dil mahla,
‘Tu nge ni, ka hre lo che’ tih hnawlna ânka chu,
A râpthlak turzia chu aw ka sawi thei lo.

7.title: Ka zawng zawng hian fak che a nuam
7.lyrics:
Lalpa, tu nge maw ka nih a mi hriat?
Ka chhungte pawh tu nge annih, Lalpa?
Daikil kar a mi, mual eng hmu pha lote hi,
Eng vangin nge maw ka hmangaih che min tih?

Ka zawng zawng hian fak che a nuam,
Ka engkim hi I ta a ni;
Ka hmangaih che, ka hmangaih a che,
Ka zawng zawng hian fak che a nuam, Lalpa.

Ka aw neih zawng zawng hian fak zai sa se,
Ka nunna hi lawmin auchhuak rawh se;
Ka neih hlu ber hmangaihna pawh pe che ila,
A hen zo lo'ng e, I hmangaih ne pawh.

I tel lo chuan eng mah a hlu zo lo,
I awm chuan ka tan lei van a chang thin;
Ka thlakhlelh ber i ni, ka lunglawmna i ni,
Ka zawng zawng hian fak che a nuam, Lalpa.

8.title: Pen khat ka pen
8.lyrics:
Manganna phurritten min delh chang ni hian,
Damlai nun tawp mai se ka ti thin.
A ngaihna hre lova a lam ka han hawi chuanin,
Thinlung lawmna thuruk min pe leh thin.

Hlim takin ka zai ang ka zai ang Halleluiah,
Ka tlantu chu a nung tih ka hria.
Engma'n min ti nghing lo'ng ka lungpui Krista a ni,
A man engkimah min lo hualhim thin.

I remruat chu ka tan hriat thiam har mahse,
Ka rinna che a nghing ngai lovang.
Tui hna thar a lo luan chhuah theihna tur atan,
Keimah zawk hi ka tlawm a tul si a.

Amah ka duhnain pen khat ka pen chuan,
Ka lam hawiin pen sawm a lo pen thin.
Hriat thiam rual loh khawngaih leh hmangaihna chuanin,
Chatuan fa nihna chanvo min lo pe.

9.title: Nang chauh ka bel ang
9.lyrics:
Ka Lal Isu, ka thlarau a chau zo ta,
Kalvari lam ka rawn pan, min pui rawh;
Ka thinlung chhungril berah lo lut la,
Aw, I ta ka ni, ka lo kal e.

Nangmahah chuan beiseina, thlamuanna leh himna,
Remna te, ngaihdamna, nunna leh hlimna famkim;
Chhandamtu tak, hmangaihtu, a bul leh tawp,
Aw, kumkhuain nang chauh ka bel ang.

Aw, ka Pathian, I kawng te min hriattir rawh,
Thutakah chuan min hruai la, nitin in;
Ka thinlung hi ti thianghlim zel ang che,
Aw, min enfiah la, min hruai zel rawh.

Ka Chhandamtu, misual te thian i nih vangin,
Ka rawn pan che tumah dang ka ngai lo;
Chatuan thlenga ka mamawh ber Lalpa,
Aw, min thukru la i angchhungah.

10.title: Thinna luipui
10.lyrics:
Damlai nite hi kawlah an herliam thin,
Tah leh buaina ten nitin min nang vela;
Lal remruat a ni tuman kan hnial thei lo,
Pathian anchhedawng hringfate kan lo ni e.

Aw, thihna luipui kan daikai hma chuan,
(He buaina) Ram khawharah hian luaithli kan nul thin;
Vansang run nuamah kan chawlh hunah chuan,
Thihna tura anchhia reng a kiang tawh ang.

Vanram panna kawng zim kan zawh mek lai hian,
Hringfa tana vawi khat thih a tul si maw;
Krista nena thihna luipui kan loh chu,
Hlauhawm ber a ni, rapthlak ber a lo ni e.

Thihna thlan pawhin a hneh loh Lal Isua,
Thihna hneha tho leh in a nung reng ang;
Zanthim a rala khua a lo var hun chuan,
Hnehtu Lal Isua zarah ka him dawn si a.

Nunna, chakna leh hun leh kum ral mahse,
Vanah in ka nei ropuina zam velah;
Lungduh kal hmasate nen kan len hun tur,
Thihna luikam atang hian ka thlir bang thei lo.

11.title: Lei leh van thil zawngte aiiin
11.lyrics:
Lei leh van thil zawngte aiin,
Ka Lalpa Kraws ka chhuang a;
Chutah chuan in ka Lalpa chu,
Ka ai a thih vangin.

Chhandamtu hnenah ka inpe,
A nunna min pek vangin;
Hmangaihna in ka chawimawi ang,
Chatuan ram ka thlen thleng in.

Keiin khawvel ka khengbet a,
Khawvel in min khengbet a;
Ka Lalpa Kaws vuang chung zelin,
Leiram hi ka chhuahsan ang.

Ka mithmuh leh ka beng hriat ten,
Suallam ah min hip mahse;
Thlarau thianghlim in min hruai a,
Hnehna chu ka chang ngei ang.

Aw, chhandamtu min hruai zella,
Damlai kawng chhukchho ah hian;
I tlansa te i lawr hunah,
Kei pawh min hruai ve ang che.

12.title: Ka duh tu dang mah an awm lo
12.lyrics:
Khawvel tuifinriat zauvah hian,
Lungngaihnaten min tuam vel a;
Aw, min kai rawh ka chhandamtu,
Buaina chhum ten min chim lai hian.

Aw, Lal Isu, nang chauh lo chu,
Vanah khianin tu nge ka neih?
Leiah pawh hianin nang lo chu,
Ka duh tu dang mah an awm lo.

En teh Lalpa, kan lenna hi,
Buai leh thimna râl lo lianin;
Thlamuanna hmun reng a awm lo,
I ram tiam ka thlen hma hi zawng.

Lei lungngaih zan thim hnuaiah hian,
I ram tiam chu min thlir tir la;
Lei lungngaihna min tuamtu hi,
Lungawi takin ka pal dai ang.

13.title: Ka lawm e, Isu
13.lyrics:
I thu hian min thlamuan thin,
I aw hian min ti chak thin;
He khawvel rohlu ai hian,
Ka ngaihlu zawk i hmangaih thu.

Ka thlang che ka ta i ni,
I ta ka ni min lei si;
Thil dang zawng zawng ai pawh hianin,
Nang ka nei hi ka lawm e Isu.

Ka chak loh chang niah pawh,
Min kalsan lo i hnai reng;
Dotu lakah min humin,
Ka tan dawhkan i buatsaih thin.

Chhandamna dang a awm lo,
Kawng dawng reng hi a awm lo;
Kawng leh thutak Lal Isua,
Nangmah chauh hi nunkawng i ni.

14.title: Min hruai tin
14.lyrics:
Nun tuihal leh beidawng chau in,
Thlalerah chawlhna ka zawng thin a;
Tuihal rehna ka hmu si lo,
A tawpah Lalpa hnenah ka kir leh thin.

Nun tuihal leh beidawng chau in,
Thlalerah chawlhna ka zawng thin a;
Tuihal rehna ka hmu si lo,
A tawpah Lalpa hnenah ka kir leh thin.


Min hruai thin tiau dup hmunah te,
Lalpa chu ka kawng hruaitu a ni;
Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

Thlipui hlauhawm, hling leh suar te,
Hrehawmna tawh chang te awm mahse;

Chung lam thlir la, hlau suh ang che,
Chutah Lalpa hmel mawi
chu a lo hnai thin.


Min hruai thin tiaudup hmunah te,
Lalpa chu ka kawng hruaitu a ni;
Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

Tawrhna a ni, ringtu nun hi,
I kawngah chauh chang te awm mahse;

Aw, nghak hram la, thim a kiang thin,
I lungngaih a hnen
thlen la a lo hnai ang.


Min hruai thin tiaudup hmunah te,
Lalpa chu ka kawng hruaitu a ni;
Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

Meialh leh chhumding in min hruai thin,
Harsatna karah lawmna min pe thin.

15.title: Rawngbawl tura chhandam
15.lyrics:
Sualna zawng kalsan a, sim a, piangthar a,
Kristaa nun neite tan;
Theihtawka rawngbawlin a thu puangdarh tura,
Rawngbawl turin min chhandam.

Rawngbawl tura chhandam kan nih tawh avangin,
Kristaah kan nung tawh si,
Rawngbawl tura chhandam thisena lei kan ni a,
Rawngbawl tura chhandam kan ni.

Lalpa tan ram zawng zawng lak anih hma chuan,
Rawngbawl tura a chhandamte;
Chhel tak leh huai takin i thawk zel ang u,
Vanah lawmman a tam si.

16.title: Khaw thianghlim Jerusalem
16.lyrics:
Zan hi a ral ang a,
Chatuanin khua a vâr ang;
Hnehna puan var sinin,
La Isua a lo kal dâwn e.

Khaw Thianghlim Jerusalem-ah chuan,
Isua tlante kan châwl ang;
Nunna Lallukhum chu khumin,
Ní angin kan êng tawh ang.

Ni leh thlaah te khian,
Chhinchhiahnate kan hmu ang;
A hun a thleng dâwn ta,
Muhilte an tho leh dâwn e.

Hrehawm leh natna te,
Tâmte pawh lo tla mahse;
Chhûm zingah Isua nên,
Vân lam hawiin kan lêng tawh ang.

17.title: Nang hnaih in
17.lyrics:
Chul lo tur ka rochan i ni,
Nunna leh thian aia hlu;
Van in kawng ka zawh mek lai hian,

Nang hnaih in (x4),
i kiangah min kaltir rawh.


Lei mawina leh nawmsak na te,
ka dil lo hning thanna nen;
Tuarna pawh ni se lawm tak in,

Nang hnaih in (x4),
i kiangah chauh kal ka duh.


Thih hlim kawr mn hruai kai ang che,
Damlai tui fawn hlauh awm nen;
Ka chatuan kawng khar mawi tak chu,

Nang hnaih in (x4),
hawn ka nuam Lalpa nang nen

18.title: I ta ka ni
18.lyrics:
Thlaler hmun khawharah, ka nun chau in a rum,
Tanpuitu ngaiin a au fo thin;
Thlamuantu khawngaihtu Lal Isua alo langa,
Ka nun riangvai rethei a thlamuang thin.


Engpawh thleng se ka lungawi ang,
Chhandamtu i kianga ka awm phawt chuan;
Khawvel hreawm Setan rallian lo hrang thin mahse,
Hnehtheihloh nun ka nei I ta ka ni.


Harsatna hringnunah alo thlen changte hian,
Hlimna ka chan lai aiin ka hnaih zawk che;
Harsatna ka dil lo che mahse aw ka Lal Isu,
Engkim hi i thu ang nizel rawh se.

Thihna Lui piah lamah ka nunna thuhruk a ni,
Khawvel buaina te'n min chimbuai tawh lo'ng;
Mahse zanthim hnuaiah ka kal thiamlo keimah chuan,
Aw Isu min kai la ka hma hruai rawh.

19.title: Vanram ropuiah
19.lyrics:
Zinkawng khawharah hian lungngaih leh natna te,
Manganna, chungpikna a lo thlen in;
Ka zam thin, ka buai thin, ka mittui a luang fo thin,
Thlen hmabak vanram khi ka ngaizual thin.

Vanram ropuiah chhandamtun min lo hmuak ang,
A kiangah tlansaten an fak ning lo'ng;
Hmangaih vanga ka Lal hmel hliam hnu khan,
Lawmna mittui far chungin ka kuangkuah ang.

Theihtawka rawngbawla kawngdik zawk tum pawhin,
Sawichhiatna, mualphona a lo thleng a;
Ka chhungril a rum thin i rawngbawl a har fo thin,
Chawlhna nuam vanram khi ka ngaizual thin.

Vanah khian ringtute kan parvul ve ang a,
Min hruai dawn kawngkhar mawi chu kan pan ang;
Ka chan tur ka dawn thin thlarauin ka tem lawk thin,
Rinnain chu hmun chu ka thlir fo thin.

20.title: Lalpa a tha
20.lyrics:
Ka hringnun chhui chang hian lungawi a har mang e,
Harsatna leh buaina te hian nitin min hual thin a;
Tanpuitu reng awm lo ang hian thinlung a rum thin a,
Lalpa beiseina erawh a nung reng thin.

Ka tan Lalpa a tha a ni, aw, ka tan a tha a ni,
Ka kawngte tluangin lang lo mahse;
Hei hi ka hrereng min enkawl thin,
Min hmangaihtu a ni, kei ka tan hian Lalpa a tha a ni.

I lam hawi, nang ngaitu i hawisan ngai lo vang,
I hmuhtir thin i ngaihsak zia, i tihsak an sawi thin;
Kei beisei tur reng nei lo hi, Lalpa i lam ka hawi,
Nangmah chauh a ni kan beisei mei eng chu.

Nangma lam tantute chhanhim loh ang mahse,
Sadraka te i hmuhtir khan i chenchilhna an chang;
Kei pawh Lalpa hei ka duh ber i ke bula awm hi,
Chu chu hlu hianin kei zawng ka ring thin e.

21.title: Inkhawmpui tiak tawh ngai lohna
21.lyrics:
Thenna ram khawvel hreawmah hian,
Tapin lungduh lenrual kan then leh thin;
Khawpui hlun ram mawi kan thlen hunah,
Luaithli nul inthen a bang tawh ang.

Chu khawpui mawiah tlansa te lennaah,
Inkhawmpui tiak tawh ngai lohna ramah;
In ka nei tah chuan, Chhandamtu buatsaih,
Inkhawmpui tiak tawh ngai lohnaah.

Hmangaihte tapin then mah ila,
Lawmna te'n mual min liamsan mahsela;
Leiah chantur nei lo mah ila,
Khawpui hlun rammawi ka tan a awm.

Chhandamtu, i hnen ka thlen hun chuan,
Harsat, mangan, buai a bo tawh ang;
Lungngaihna chhum te'n min chim tawh lo'ng,
Khawpui hlun ram mawi ka thlen hun chuan.

22.title: A hmangaihna a lo ni
22.lyrics:
Ka Lalpa min hruaina hi,
Thu in ka hril seng dawn lo;
Ka zai leh ka banphar te zawng pawh hian,
A hmangaih an hril seng lo.

Min hmangaihna chhiar dawn ila,
Ka hringnun hian a hril phak lo;
Ka nun leh ka neih zawngte nen hianin,
A hmangaihna a lo ni.

A malsawm ka chhiar seng lo,
Ka mamawh chitin min pe;
Lamtluang zim leh thim ka zawh lai pawhin,
A hmangaih banin min kai thin.

Ka hmabak a eng zel ang,
Doral lian a tlawm zel ang;
Ka rin leh ka beiseite aia sangin,
Min la chawisang zel dawn si.

23.title: Beramno kan fak ang
23.lyrics:
Mithianghlimte lenna Beram no khawpuiah,
Ka tlantu hmel duhawm ka hmu ang, lawmtakin;
Chutah buaina leh sualna vanga ka rumna zawng,
Ka chhandamtu hnenah ka thlen ang.

Chatuanin, aw, ka fak ning lo'ng,
Chutah van angel leh serafim zawng te nen;
Hlimtakin kan leng ang, thlarau chawlhna ramah,
Chatuanin Beram no kan fak ang.

Beram no thisen hlua tlansa te zawng chuan,
Chatuanin hlim takin Chhandamtu chu fakin;
Lungngaih buaina leh hreawmna tuar tawh lo in,
Chatuanin beram no an fak ang.

Chatuanin chu ramah hmangaih lungduh te nen,
Hla mawi ropui remin bang lovin kan fak ang;
“A thianghlim e,” tiin chhun leh zan chawl lovin,
Chatuanin Beram no kan fak ang.

24.title: Lawmna tlang
24.lyrics:
Lalpa, nangin min hria, ka nun chhungril zawng nen,
Ka hun pumin min hruai, chhinchhiahna mak tak nen;
Min hriatrengna hi ka tan a va hlu em,
Chauh chang awm thin mahse, Lalpa ka zui ang che.

Ka Lal leh ka Pathian awm reng i lo ni e,
Tunge hrilhfiah zo ang le?
Mihring finna hian a chhui phal mawlh si lo,
Fak tawk theih che ka nuam, hei hi ka duhsam ber.

Ka tan i remruatah lungawi ka tum ngai lo,
Vuina hlira khatin duh tin ka dil thin che;
Mahse, nangin min hria, ka mamawh chauh min pe,
Lungawina tlang thawveng boruak min hip tir thin.

Harsat, mangan, buaina, hrehawmnaten min bawm,
Damchhung khawsak lungkham vangin ka rum fo thin;
Lungngaia ka awmin Lalpa'n min ngaihtuah thin,
Tahna ruam atangin lawmna tlangah min lawn tir.

25.title: Aw hmangaihna va thûk èm
25.lyrics:
1. Aw hmangaihna a va thuk em!
Mi sual dum ber min silfaina chu;
Anchhedawng Kraws ka tan malsawmna,
Van Lalber thihna Kraws ka tan damna.

Lei leh vana roreltu,
Kraws lera tuihala au kha;
Vana Lalber ranthlenga zal hi,
Eng dang vang a ni lo; keimah vang a ni.

2. Aw hmangaihna a va sang em!
Ka hril seng lo min hmangaihna hi,
Ka aw neih zawng i hming ropui nan,
Min hmangaihtu Lalpa, ka hmangaih che.

3. Aw hmangaihna a va zau em!
I lalțhutthleng ropui kalsan a;
Lei hrehawma i lo kal mai hi
Aw a va ropui em! ka hril seng lo.

4. Aw hmangaihna a va mak em!
Ka chhiar seng lo min enkawlna hi;
Aw, mi tling lote min thlang chhuakin,
Țawmkai lo berte pawh min hmang țhin a

26.title: Min hnanghah si a
26.lyrics:
I khawngaih kraws kawng zawh in,
I rawngbawl lamtluang ka chhui,
Kawng nuam leh hahdam changte pawh awm thin;
Kawng hahthlak leh ralti a,
Min hruai ni pawh hian in,
I rinawm zia min hmuh tir leh thin.


Ka tan i rinawmna, aw! a ropui e,
Engdang reng hi, aw! ka sawi thei lo;
I khawngaih lainatna ka dawn hi a ropui e,
Ka hmangaih che min hmangaih si a (2).


I khawngaih leh malsawmna,
Lei rohlu ka chan zawng te,
Ka chhiar seng love, aw! a ropui e;
I thatna ka tan lawmna,
I khawngaih ka tan chawlhna,
Tu nen nge ka teh dawn che Lalpa?

Hei hi hlan nawn ka duh thin,
Ka nun leh theihna te hi,
I tan rimtuiah lo chang fo rawh se;
Hmangaih che ka thiam ne'maw,
I duhzawng tih mai loh chu,
Ka hmangaih che min hmangaih si a.

27.title: I fak ang u
27.lyrics:
Khawvel ropui, mawina leh nawmsakna ten,
Krista hmel an hliah fo thin;
Kan hmangaih ber te pawn natna min thlen fo thin,
Damna Krista hmel en ila, lungawina kan hmu leh thin,
A hming ropui i fak ang u.

A hming ropui i fak ang u,
Krista a ropui ber sia;
Amah thlan zel hi kan tihtur ber a lo ni,
Kan damna Krista, a hming i fak ang u.

Khawvelah hian kan duh tinreng nei mah ila,
Khawvel mamawh ber chu Isua;
Kan sual man tlan nan krawsah kan tan a lo tuar,
Kan sual dum thimte a lo fai nan,
Chanchintha hril ila, a hming ropui i fak ang u.

28.title: Lal ropui kan neih chuan
28.lyrics:
Indona kan hlau lon'g,
Zan thim kan hlau lo'ng.
Nang nen zawh kan zuam thin phairuam zau tak pawh,
Nang kan kiangah kalin,
Hma I hruai ang a,
Kan inhumhimna leh chhandamna I ni.

Fak hla sa in; Lal ropui kan nei,
A hmangaihna chu kan inhumhimna kulhpui,
Tehkhin rual loh, hmangaihna ropui;
Tu'n nge min do thei ang Lal ropui kan neih chuan.

Harsatna te tawk in,
Chauh chang nei thin in;
Bosan che mahila, min hmangaih reng fo;
Min thlahthlam ngai lova, min en san ngai lo.
Khawngaihna tawp lovin Nangin min chelh reng thin.

(Bridge)

Eng hlauhawm mahin min then hrang thei lo'ng,
Thih leh hrem hmun te'n min ngam lo'ng,
Kan tan a fapa hlan tu chuan,
Hmangaihin min pawm.

29.title: Lungpui nghet
29.lyrics:
Sual lak ata zalen ka ni ta,
Kraws kan phurrit zawngte;
Lal Isua'n min tlenfai sak tawh si,
Lalpa kohna i chhang let ang u.

Chhungril lamah kan chak lohnate,
Ama hnenah i hlan ang u;
Chu chu kan mawina tur a lo ni,
I thinlung Lalpa hnenah hlan rawh.

Chatuan ata ka innghahna nghing ve ngai lo,
Kan Pathian lungpui nghet tak i lo ni e,
I ropui ber kei ka tan hian.

Chhungril lamah kan chak lohnate,
Ama hnenah i hlan ang u;
Chu chu kan mawina tur a lo ni,
I thinlung Lalpa hnenah hlan rawh.

Chatuan ata ka innghahna nghing ve ngai lo,
Kan Pathian lungpui nghet tak i lo ni e,
I ropui ber kei ka tan hian.

Chatuan ata ka innghahna nghing ve ngai lo,
Kan Pathian lungpui nghet tak i lo ni e,
I ropui ber kei ka tan hian.

Chatuan ata ka innghahna nghing ve ngai lo,
Kan Pathian lungpui nghet tak i lo ni e,
I ropui ber kei ka tan hian.

30.title: An leng za tawh ang
30.lyrics:
Lei hringnun a ral hun chuan,
Lalpa ramah kan leng ang;
Khawvel hi ka ngai tawh lo'ng,
Kir zai reng kan rel tawh lo'ng.

Chu hmuna leng te chuan thenna thu an sawi ngai lo,
Hmangaihtu leh hmangaih te an intawkkhawm ang a,
Hmangaihnain an leng za tawh ang a.

Lei hringmi ni tawh loin,
Vanmi te kan ni tawh zawk;
Tunah zawng khualzin kan ni,
Vanram kan ta a ni si.

Natna leh lungngaihnate,
Chu ramah chuan a awm lo'ng;
Thihna te'n hmun an chang lo'ng,
Tahna reng a awm tawh lo'ng.

Lalpa hmel ka hmuh chuan,
Min tlanna thu ka hrilh ang;
Chutah van kawtthler fangin,
Lalpa fakin kan zai ang.

31.title: Lalthuthleng kiangah
31.lyrics:
Phurrit phur leh chau takin lungngaia rum changin,
Khawvel hi hreawm ka ti thin;
Mahse, zam mai lovin hmalam ka pan zel ang a,
Chatuan chawlhna ka la thleng ngei ang.

Van kawtthler mawiah min rawn zawn chuanin,
Lalthuthleng kiangah min rawn hmu ang;
Van angel leh tlante nen fakin kan lo zai ang a,
Lalthuthleng kiangah min hmu ang.

Chu in nawm leh ropui zia kan hrethiam phak lo'ng e,
A chanve pawh kan hre lo ve;
Chu in ropui taka ka chhandamtu chu hmuin,
Ka thleng ngei ang hmun min buatsaih chu.

Zin kawng chanchinte hrilhin a kutah min chelhin,
Ka mittui min hrukfai sak ang;
Lawmin min kai ang a, ka lut ang hneh hla sain,
Ka thleng ngei ang Lalthuthleng bul chu.

Beramno chu fakin kan lo zai ang a,
Min rawn hmu ang, ropuina ka chang tawh ang;
Lalthuthleng kiangah min hmu ang.

32.title: Ka thupui ber
32.lyrics:
Ramtiam lam panin chak lo tak chungin nitin ka kal a,
Mahse, aw Lalpa, chimbuaitu an tam ngei, ka kal thiam lo;
Setana'n nitin min bei, nangmah kalbo san turin,
Mahse, chak lo ber lai paw'n ka peng ngam lo,
Lalpa, nangin min chelh tlat rawh.

I ta ka ni e, chatuan atan,
Ka thiamna, finna zawng te;
Lalpa, i tan a ni,
Hei hi ka thupui ber - nangmah fak hi.

Tunah, aw Lalpa, hei hi ka hria a, lawmthu ka hrilh che,
Ka tlin loh anga nangin min pawmin min lo duh si;
Ka sualna zawng zawng te hi mite'n hrereng thin mahse,
Lalpa, nang erawh chuanin i theihnghilh si,
I hmangaihna ka fak fo ang.

33.title: Lal Isua hmangaihna
33.lyrics:
Lal Isua hmangaihna ropui hi,
Hringfa ten kan hrefiah zo lo fo thin;
Hmangaihna thuril danglam leh mawi chu,
Lal Isua hmangaihna hi a ni.

Nunchau in i rum thin maw? Beidawng in i tap thin maw?
Lal Isua hmangaihna chuan a nghak che;
Sawmtute a hnar ngai lo, tlai luat pawh a awm nem maw,
Lal Isua hmangaihna hi a mak a ni.

Lal Isua hi aw a mawi ber e,
Hlinglukhum in phuar vel mahsela;
Ka lal ka chhandamtu chu ka fak ang chatuan thleng in,
Haleluiah! tiin ka fak ang.

Bawrhsawmna ka tawh chang leh chak lova ka awmlai pawn,
Lal Isua hmangaihna chu a tawk e;
Mal in min awmtir ngailo zanthim pawh,
Amah nen chuan muang takin ka kal amah ka thian a ni.

Eng dang reng ka ngai tawh lo'ng,
I hmangaihna kut chauh hi aw Isu ka tan a tawk khawvelah,
Van hmunmawi ka thlen thleng in hei hi ka chatuan hla tur,
Lal Isua hmangaihna hi a hlu ber e.

34.title: Pathian hmel
34.lyrics:
Thim zingah thuin, mangang ritphur in,
Hlim ni reng i beisei ngam tawh lo maw?
Chunglam thlir reng la, chhandamtu lam chu,
Pathian hmel duhawm chu a lo êng ngei dawn e.

I rilru lungngaia rumin,
Mangang in tap thin mah la;
I beiseina chu bo rih mahse,
Thim chu a kiang ang, khua a la vâr dawn;
Pathian hmel duhawm chu a lo êng ngei dawn e.

I thlarau chauin, i thinlung a hliam,
Lalpa that zia chu i lo ringhlel maw?
Mahse nghak hram rawh, kawng hawn a ni dawn,
Pathian hmel duhawm chu a lo êng ngei dawn e.

Lei hringnun hi chuaiin a ral mek,
Lalpa thu erawh a ding reng dawn;
Krista ngei chu a lo hnai ta a,
Pathian hmel duhawm chu a lo êng ngei dawn e.

35.title: Duhthlanna sang ber
35.lyrics:
Dam lai lamtluang ka zawh laiin,
Doral a lian thlemna karah;
Thlarau zawngin peih mahse,
Tisa erawh a chak si lo,Ka hneh zo lo ka tlu leh si thin.
(Châng 2-na sak leh nghal tur)

Mi rethei ka va han ni em!
Tu in nge min chhanchhuak ang le?
Thihna taksa atang hian;
Tihtheih dang reng ka nei si lo,
Duhthlanna sang ber hlan mai loh chu.

Aw tunah lawmin ka khat,
Krista keimahah a nung zawk si;
Thiamloh chan reng a awm tawh lo,
Min tlantu nung anih vangin.

Thlemna thlipui a zual zel ang,
Doral lian Setan ramah hian;
Mahse himna kulh Krista,
Chatuan nunna ka thlan vangin,
Kumkhuain ka him reng tawh ang a.

36.title: Vanglai nun
36.lyrics:
Thiltha ti atan khawngaih in min ko,
Thatlai nite hi Lalpa tan a hmang turin;
Thiamna theihna leh kan aw neih zawng te,
Rinawmin Lalpa tan i hlan ang u.

Vanglai nun hi hlimthla ang maiin,
Hlobet par ang in a la chuai mai dawn si;
Rinawm takin thatlaini te hi Lalpa tan i hlan ang u,
Kan vanglaini a chuai mai dawn a sin.

He khawvel ah hian harsatna tawk in,
Manganna te leh beidawnna te lo thleng in;
Sualna chhumpui leh thlemna ten min bei mahse,
Nghet taka dingin i pen zel ang u.

Hringnun lo ralin thihna thlan thim chu bel in,
Chhandamtu Lalpa i tawk ngam dawn em?

37.title: Ka mit ngei hian a thlir ang
37.lyrics:
Ka tlantu chu a nung e;
Nakinah khawvêlah hian,
Hmuh hmaih rual lohvin a lo ding ang;
Ka vun hi tihchhiata a,
Awm hunin ka la hmu ang,
Ka mit ngei hian a thlir ang LAL ISUA.

Hei mawlh hi ka lungkham ber,
Ka Chhandamtu hmel hmuh hi;
Ka tuarna zawng zawng hi nêp mah sela;
Ka tuar chhan LALPA a ni,
Ka chân chhan chu a ni si,
Ka dam chhan chu LAL ISUA hi a ni.

Vawi tam tak hmu chak chein
Dil fo ṭhin che mah ila,
Ka khualzin kumte a lo tâwp ang a,
Ka tisa hian a hmu ang,
I Thu-in min lo hrilh si;
Thlarau mitin ka hmu, Halleluia!

Tunah zawng darthlalangah,
Kan hmu chauh; chutih hun chuan,
Inhmatawnin a ni ang, a kim tawh ang;
Hriatna chu ka hre kim ang;
Hmuh theih loh zawng ka hmu ang,
Pathian hmêl ropui tâwp chu ka hmu ang.

38.title: Lawmthu ka hrilh che

39.title: Van lawmna kim
39.lyrics:
Chhandamtu min hruaina lamtluang ka thlir let a,
Khawngaihna in min chhandam a;
Khawngaihna in min nun sak thin,
Hmangaihna in min enkawl thin.

Van lawmna kim ka neih theih nan,
Lei lawmna hi min thiah sak a;
Van nun hlut zia ka hriat theih nan,
Hringnun nep zia min hriattir thin.

Khawngaihna in min thukru in min awmtlei thin,
Damlai hreawm kawng chhuk chho pawh;
Chung muvanlai iang min chawiin,
Thlaler ah pawh bikna min siam.

Ka hma ah hian fiahna tinreng a rawn tir a,
Amah vekin min hneh sak a;
Ka theihna zawng ka sawm khawm pawh,
Engmah lo mai a chan tir thin.

Lei lungngaihna pelh kan nghalhlel ringtu ten,
Mahse, tihtur min pe;
Khawngaihna a rawngbawl tur leh,
Khawvel thim hi tieng tur in.

40.title: Lalpa thatna
40.lyrics:
Ka hmangaih che, i khawngaihna tlai ve ngai lo,
Ka nun hi nangin i chelh thin a,
Zing khawvar engmawi lo chhuakin,
Zan mu ka chhin hma zawng,
Aw ka sa ang i thatna hi Lalpa.

I rinawm zia ka nunah a lang,
I thatzia hi ka chungah a lang thin;
Ka theihna zawng i tan ka hlan ang,
Aw, ka sa ang i thatna hi Lalpa.

I anka mawi meipui kara min chhantu chu,
Zanthim hnuaiah pawh nangin min hnaih fo thin a;
Ka innghahna i ni a, ka tana thian hlu ber,
Ka dawng fo thin i thatna hi Lalpa.

I thatna ropui tak chuan mi zui reng fo thin a,
I thatna ropui tak chuan mi zui reng fo thin a,
I hmaah kunin ka rawn inpe e ka nun ka hlan a che,
I thatna ropui tak chuan mi zui reng fo thin a,
I thatna ropui tak chuan mi zui reng fo thin a,
I thatna ropui tak chuan mi zui reng fo thin a
I hmaah kunin ka rawn inpe e ka nun ka hlan a che,
I thatna ropui tak chuan mi zui reng fo thin a.

I rinawm zia ka nunah a lang,
I thatzia hi ka chungah a lang thin;
Ka theihna zawng i tan ka hlan ang,
Aw, ka sa ang i thatna hi Lalpa.

Ka sa ang a, ka sa ang a....

I rinawm zia ka nunah a lang,
I thatzia hi ka chungah a lang thin;
Ka theihna zawng i tan ka hlan ang,
Aw, ka sa ang i thatna hi Lalpa.

Aw ka sa ang a, i thatna hi Lalpa.

41.title: Min tlan ta
41.lyrics:
Beram No thisen a tlan ka ni,
chu tlanna ropui hril ka nuam;
Khawngaihna kang lova tlan ka ni,
Chatuana tan a fa ka ni.

Min tlan Beram No thisenin min tlan
Min tlan, min tlan, chatuana tan a fa

Isuan min tlanna a va lawmawm,
ka hril seng lo ka lawmna thu;
Englai pawhin min awm pui reng thin,
Ka thinglungah ennna min pe.

A lal ropuina a inthuamin,
A hmel mawi ka la hmu dawn si;
A hmangaihna in min hruai zel a,
Zan thim hnuaiah pawh ka fak ang.

42.title: Hawilopar mawi Isua
42.lyrics:
He khawvel lungduh inthenna ramah hian,
Vanglaini ten mual an liam a;
Tahna leh lungngaihna a lo thlen lai te hian,
Min ngaih tir chatuan ram mawi chu.

Ka taksa hi lo chuai mahse,
Piallei hmun khawharah;
Famdairial changin zal mah ila,
Zion tlang mawi khi ka thlen hunah chuan,
Hawilopar mawi Isua ka hmu ang.

Thihna Jordan lui ka pelh hunah chuan,
Hmangaih lungduh then tak te nen;
Bang lo vin, aw, kan intawk leh ang a,
Hmangaihna ram mawiah chuan.

43.title: Van khua
43.lyrics:
Rauthlain ka fang vel chung vankhua nuam khi,
Chutah lungduh kal ta ka han hmu a;
An leng dial e, Angel dungthulin,
He lei hringnun reng hi an ngai tawh lo.

Aw a va mawi em ve, ka sawi thei lo,
Hringmi ânka hian a hril zo lo;
Tual an lenna rangka dâr luan nen,
A laiah nunna tui a luang del e.

Chu nunna lui kam hmun hring nuam cham diaiah,
A par vul mawi ngei nunna siahthing chu;
Hawi vel ila, engmawi a zam vel,
Thianghlimna leh mawi tin a kim ngei e.

Hlimna êng a kai chiai an sakhmelah chuan,
Hmangaih khat liam par tlanin an leng e;
Van mi zaipawl, mawi tawpin an zai,
Van khua a nghawr vel an fak zai ri chuan.

He lei ram ka zin kawng hi ka pelh hun chuan,
Chu ram mawiah hlimten ka leng ve ang:
Van mi zaipawl fak hla zawm vein,
Tlantu kiangah ka chawl kumkhua tawh ang.

44.title: Nang nen chuan
44.lyrics:
Nang nen chuan khawi hmunah pawh,
Nang nen chuan engtiang pawhin;
Hrehawmah pawh, rethei pawhin,
Nang nen chuan vanram a chang thin.

I hnena awm turin keimah hi min siam a,
I hnena awm turin vak bo lo turin;
I tel lo chuan engmah hian mi ti tlai thei lo e,
Ka famkimna, aw, nang chauh hi i ni.

Nang nen chuan khawi hmunah pawh,
Nang nen chuan tlakchham a awm lo;
Nun khawhara thian nei lo in mal in awm mah ila ,
Nang nen chuan vanram a chang thin.

Aw Isu, i hnenah chauh ka thla a muang, a hahchawl thin,
I tel lo a lawmna tur zawng ruai hmu si lo in;
I tel lo a tlei thei lo min siam i chennan chauh,
I tel lo chuan ka nun a kim thei lo,
Mahse, nang nen chuan vanram a chang thin.

45.title: Aw Kraws
45.lyrics:
Kraws thu chu boral mekte tan chuan atna,
Chhandam fate tan Pathian thiltihtheihna;
Aw, Kraws, miten hmusit thin mahse,
Min chawisangtu ka chhuang zel fo ang che.

Aw Kraws, aw Kraws, Pathian thiltihtheihna,
Aw Kraws, aw Kraws ka va ngaisang che em.

Anchhedawng thing Krista thihna chu,
Ka thihnaah Lalpan min puan sak ta;
Adama mihrinna chu hlip thla in,
Krawsah ngei chuan min ti boral ta si.

Krista thihna a thi ve tawh te chuan,
Tholeh Krista nunna an chang ngei ang;
He dinhmun hi Lalpan i tan ngei chuan,
A siam che hi i haider dawn em ni.

46.title: Hnehna chu Lalpa ta a ni
46.lyrics:
Thenkhatte'n tawlailir an ring a,
Thenkhatte'n sakawrte an ring a.
Keini erawh chuan kan Pathian hming kan lam ang.
Kan tho ang a hnehna chu kan puang zel dawn a ni.

(Keini zawng) Boral tura hnungtawlh pawla mi kan ni lo,
Nunna humhim tura rinna nei kan ni zawk.
A chhandamnaah chuan hlimin kan zai ang a,
Halleluiah, hnehna chu Lalpa ta a ni.

Sual doral lo hrang ṭhin mahsela,
Thlipui ang min nuai vel mahsela.
Kan zam ngai lovang, Lalpa'n kan hma a hruai ang,
Pathian hmingin hnehna puan kan zar ngei dawn a ni.

Chhel tak leh huai takin awm ila,
Kan vanglai Lalpa tan hlan ila.
Kan rinawm phawt chuan sual doral kan ngam ngei ang,
Lawmman ropui Lallukhum kan chang ngei dawn a ni.

47.title: Sawi nawm leh rawh
47.lyrics:
Thiam tawk tea ka ngaihtuah hian
Ka tlantu min hmangaihna leh
Ka tan Kraws-a inpek chanchin
A mawiin a ngaihnawm bang lo ve.


Sawi nawn leh rawh min hrilh leh rawh
Isua'n ka tan a tuarna kha
Kalvari ka damna chanchin
Aw ngaihnawm ka tibang theilo ve.


Engah ranthleng kraws a chan le?
Hausa mahse keimah vanga
A retheih tak chanchin ngei kha
Ka ning lo'ng min hrilh nawn fo rawh aw?

Ka Chhandamtu'n mittui nena
"Ka Pa, ngaidam rawh", a tih kha
A țawngțai kam chhuak aw mawi ber
Thinlai ah a ngaihnawm bang lo ve.

48.title: Kan fak zel dawn
48.lyrics:
Riangvai saltang chhuahna turin,
Isua Krista a lo vakvai;
Tihduhdah tuar, rethei riangvai,
Isuan kraws-ah min hnehsak ta.

Halleluiah, Halleluiah,
Lalpan thil ropui min tihsak e!
Tawtawrawt leh Phenglawng rite nen;
Darbenthek ri thum leh fiakin,
Perhkhuang tingtang chi hrang hrang nen,
Khuangte leh lamin kan fak zel dawn.

Hmangaihnaa min zawng chhuaktu,
Ka rul seng lo’ng hring chan chhungin,
Misual dum ber min silfai ta,
Chatuan nunna ka lo nei ta.

Ringtu zawngte, kal zel ila,
Lalpa hming thianghlim ropui chu;
“A thianghlim e,” ti a auvin,
Kan theihtawpin kan fak zel dawn.

49.title: A chetna tur mi a zawng
49.lyrics:
Lal Saula ralthuam a ngai lo va,
Amah rin ngamna ka thuam a ni;
Hmalam thlir lova chunglam thlirtu,
nih hi ka tan hian a tawk.

Thunawn:
Lalpa mit chu hmun tinah a leng ruai a,
A lama rilru dik tak putu an awm phawt chuan;
A chakzia tilang turin Lalpa a ngawi rei ngai lo,
Lalpa mit chuan a chetna tur mi a zawng ruai a ni.

Rawhtuina mei kan thihna tur maw,
kan zam lo, Lalpa kan phat thei lo;
Nun hlana i thu zawm tu te hi,
kan thi lo, chhantu kan nei.

Lalpa tan chuan harsa a awm lo,
theih loh, tlai tawh pawh a awm thei lo;
Engkimin a thupek an awih thin,
A thua awm vek an ni.

50.title: Eliza hun ropui
50.lyrics:
Hei a ni zan hun ropui a thu puanin a lo awm a,
A lo thleng dawn si a hun dikna,
Felna, siamthar lehna ni chu;
A serh leh sang awm lo khandaih nen,
Riltam leh tuihal a lo thleng ta,
Mahse, hmun khawhar he thlalerah,
Lalpa kawng sialtute kan ni si a.

A lo kal dawn chhum zingah te khian,
Ni aia engin tawtawrawt ri nen;
Lal Isua chhandamtu a ni,
Hlim takin lawm r'u, aw chhandamna.

A ni e Ezekiela hun chu, ruhro pawh tisain a lo khat,
Hei hi chhiahhlawh Davida hmun chu,
Temple siamthar lehna ni chu;
Buhseng hun kan thleng, lo hawi chhuak la,
Lalpa huan a hmin zo dawn ta e,
A seng khawm tura a mi rawihte kan ni,
Hrilin a thu kan au pui e.

Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,
Jehova lo Lal dang a awm lo,
Jehova Lal ropui a ni,

51.title: Chu luipui ah kan intawk ang
51.lyrics:
Chu luipuiah kan intawk ang,
A mawi ngei e, a fawn vel e damten,
Mithianghlimte nen zai kan vawr ang,
Chatuan lalthutthleng kiangah.

Kan pa lalthutthleng kianga chuan
Nunna tui a luang chamdel;
Angel varte lenna hmunah,
Tawh leh ni herchhuak ang maw?

Chu lui thianghlim mawi takah chuan,
Bawlhhlawh reng a awm tawh lo'ng;
Chawimawina hla mawi chu sain,
Chatuanin kan hlim tawh ang.

Chu luipuiah kan intawk ang,
A mawi ngei e, a fawn vel e damten,
Mithianghlimte nen zai kan vawr ang,
Chatuan lalthutthleng kiangah.

Chu luipui mawi kan thlen hun chuan,
Phurrit reng a awm tawh lo'ng,
Khawngaihnain ro a rel ang,
Lallukhum kan khum tawh ang.

Krista hmel engmawi tak mai chuan,
Chu luipui mawi chu a en;
Thihna ngam loh mithianghlimten,
Chhandamna hla mawi an sa.

Chu luipuiah kan intawk ang,
A mawi ngei e, a fawn vel e damten,
Mithianghlimte nen zai kan vawr ang,
Chatuan lalthutthleng kiangah.

Reiloteah kan thleng thuai dawn,
Rangkachak khawpui hlun chu;
Lawmna chuai lo kan chang ang a,
Thlamuangin kan chawl tawh ang.

Chu luipuiah kan intawk ang,
A mawi ngei e, a fawn vel e damten,
Mithianghlimte nen zai kan vawr ang,
Chatuan lalthutthleng kiangah.

52.title: Lalpa chu fakin ka chawi mawiang
52.lyrics:
Lalpa chu fakin ka chawimawi ang,
Min tlantu a nih vangin;
Hla ka sa ang, a khawngaihna hla,
Ka sa zel fo vang a.


Ka sual zawng zawng aman min tlaksak,
A hming thianghlimin; (2)
Ka sual zawng zawng aman min tlaksak,
Haleluia! A hmingin.


Ka sual zawng zawng nen ka lo kalin,
Aman chawlhna min pe a;
Min tlan chhuah avangin ka fak ang,
Hla mawi chu sa zelin.

A hnen ka thlen chuan ka fak zual ang,
Thihna ata min humhim;
Ka fak fo vang a, chatuan thlengin,
Ka fak tawp thei lo vang.

Tu pawh a zawngtu tan hmun a awm,
A duh apiang lo r'u;
Lawmna famkim chu dahin a awm,
Lawmin i zai ang u.

53.title: Isua hmangaihna leh thatna
53.lyrics:
Isua hmangaihna leh thatna,
Leh zahngaihna i fak ang;
Van ram in eng leh malsawmna,
Kan tan a han buatsaih a.

Van ram kan thlen hun chuanin,
Chu ni ropui chu kan lawm em em ang;
Lal Isua kan hmuhin,
Hnehtu chu fakin kan zai ang.

Van ram panin kan kal laiin,
Chhumte a lo zing thin ang;
Mahse, kan kal pelh hun chuanin,
Thim leh thawhpik a kiang.

Rinawm leh fal taka awmin,
Nitin rawng i bawl tlat ang;
A ropuina chang ve turin,
Dam chhungin i bei zel ang.

Kan hmaa lawmman um zelin,
A mawina kan thlir thuai ang;
Lungman tam kawngkaa lutin,
Rangkachak tual kan leng ang.

54.title: Ni tin Isua ka thinlungin
54.lyrics:
Ni tin Isua ka thinlungin ka hmangaih deuh deuh va,
Amah chu ni eng ai pawhin a mawi zawk zawk em em a;
Amah chu ka tana mawina ropui ber a lo ni,
Ni tin a hma aiin a lo mawi deuh deuh zel a ni.

A then pawh kan hre thei lo,
He lui kam atang hian;
Aw, tah chuan a hma aiin,
A mawi zual zel tur a ni.

Hla taka ka hmuhin a  ropuinain min en a,
Lili par mawi leh varhparh arsi aia eng a ni;
Ka duhnate a tikhatin a tilawm deuh deuh va,
Ni tin a hma aiin a lo mawi deuh deuh zel a ni.

Ka rilru a lo chauh hunin aman min tanpui thin,
Ka hrehawm laiin aman a angchhungah min pawm thin;
Krista ka sual zawng zawng phurtu kha ka hmangaih a ni,
Ni tin a hma aiin a lo mawi deuh deuh zel a ni.

55.title: Nangma thil ropuite an sawi
55.lyrics:
Nangma thil ropuite an sawi,
Zion kan Pathian khawpui;
A thu phelh tawh ngai lo va khan,
A siam che ama chen nan,
Chatuan lungpuia innghat chu,
Enginnge tinghing ang che;
Chhandamna banga inhungin,
I hmelma i hlau lo vang.

Enteh, chatuan hmangaihnaah,
Tuinung luite lo chhuakin;
I fate zawng zawng a chawm a,
Tlakchham reng an hlau lo vang,
Chutiang lui a luan chhungin,
Tunge tuihalin chau vang?
Lalpa a petu a zarah,
Khawngaihna a bang lo vang.

A hmun tin velahte chuanin,
Ropuina himna turin;
Mei leh chhumte a inlar a,
Lalpa a hnai tih hriat nan,
Chutin anmahni avang chuan,
Eng leh hlim nuam chu an hmu;
Him nan manaa chu an ring a,
Lalpa'n anni a pek chu.

Lalpa Ziona khawpuiah chuan,
Khawngaiha min tel tir chuan,
Khawvelin min hmusit mah se,
I hming chauh ka chhuang ang e,
Khawvel lawmna a ral mek a,
A ropui leh mawina nen,
Zion fate chauh lo chuanin,
Lawmna tak an nei lo ve.

56.title: Van hmun ropui, hmangaith ram khi
56.lyrics:
Vân hmun ropui hmangaih ram khi,
Mi thianghlimte in a ni;
Anni hnêna chêng ve tûrin,
Khawvêl thilte chu paih la.

Khawvêl ni hi a ral hunin,
Nakinah in nuamah,
Mi thianghlimte lênna ramah,
Vân inah kan chêng ang.

Chatuan in nuam ropui taka
Lêngte zawng chhûngkhat an ni;
Chu in nuama chêng ve tûrin,
Chi tin, hnam tin an sâwm a.

Chhandamtu thihna hmun ropui,
Hmangaihna hi an hril vêl;
Inbuatsaih hun a kim chhûngin,
A hmangaihna chu ring la.

Pakhat zêla an kal bovin,
An kiam thîn chhûngkaw tinrêng;
Lungduh zawng zawng chatuan hmunah,
Kim leh ni a awm ang em?
